fullplot: Set against the turbulent atmosphere of the 1960s, Tropicèlia is a feature length documentary exploring the Brazilian artistic movement known as tropicèlia, and the struggle its artists endured to protect their right to freely express revolutionary thought against the traditional brazilian music of that time.
